com.facebook.litho

Class StateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.StateHandler

  • public class StateHandler
extends Object
    Holds information about the current State of the components in a Component Tree.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HashSet<String> mNeededStateContainers
      Contains all keys of components that were present in the current ComponentTree and therefore their StateContainer needs to be kept around.
      Map<String,StateContainer> mStateContainers
      Maps a component key to a component object that retains the current state values for that key.
